'''''Beyond Bree'' August 1981''' is an issue of the [[Beyond Bree]] journal published by the [[Tolkien Special Interest Group of American Mensa]]

==Contents==
* "Bilbo le hobbil' by N. Martsch
* Report on Origins VII (wargame convention)
* Fundamentalist protest against Dungeons & Dragons
